title: Could you recommend me some songs for a kpop audition? I am better at rap than vocals, so a rap song would be better, but I'm trying to improve my singing too. It can be Korean or English too, I just want it to show my skills fully. - Quora

response.answer_text: You can sing D4 or “Ddu Du Ddu Du”by BLACKPINK. Jennie and Lisa's rap are pretty hard and Rose and Jisoo vocals are good but not too difficult. So this song might be perfect for you. It has a good amount of Korean and English. https://youtu.be/IHNzOHi8sJs Here's the link to the MV and you can search up the lyrics in the description or on YouTube or Google! If the Korean rap is hard, sing the English translated one. ~Cheryl ❤️
